hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!c:\cygwin\bin\bash --login date
echo message="Automation Test for branch 3.1.0 or 3.2 only, aborted Automation Test" > ${WORKSPACE}/properties.txt if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "3.1.0" && "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "3.2" ]]; then echo Automation Test for branch 3.1.0 or 3.2 only... exit 1 exit 1 fi
User=admin:$artifactory_pass ARTIFACTORY=https://artifactory/api/storage/ipp-review/SFB/$GERRIT_BRANCH DOWNLOAD=$(echo $ARTIFACTORY | sed 's|api/storage/||')
change=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4` ps=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f5` echo change $change, PS: $ps pwd
ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit query --patch-sets --submit-records --all-approvals $change > current$change.txt verified=$(grep -A1 "label: Verified" current$change.txt | grep status | sed 's/.*: //') echo Find verified score: $verified # Can be: OK, REJECT or NEED
if [ "$verified" == "REJECT" ]; then echo Build failed, can not execute Atomation-Test ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --message "'Automation-test can not run if Vrified is -1'" --tag "'Automation'" $change,$lastps exit 1 fi
grep 'kind:\|number:' current$change.txt | tail -n +2 | sed 's/.*: //' > $change.txt lastps=$(tail -2 $change.txt | head -1) echo Executed with last PatchSet $ps if ! [ "$lastps" -eq "$lastps" ] 2>/dev/null; then echo not number; lastps=$ps; fi
while [ $lastps -gt 0 ]; do if ! curl -ks -u $User -X GET $ARTIFACTORY | grep -q ${change}-$lastps; then kind=$(grep -A1 $lastps $change.txt | tail -1) # could be: REWORK, TRIVIAL_REBASE, MERGE_FIRST_PARENT_UPDATE, NO_CODE_CHANGE or NO_CHANGE echo find kind of patch-set $lastps is $kind if [[ "$kind" =~ NO_.*CHANGE ]]; then ((lastps--)) else since=$(date -d"$(grep -A3 "type: Verified" current$change.txt | grep grantedOn | tail -1 | sed 's/.*: //')" +%s) if [ $(( $(date +%s)-$since )) -gt 864000 ]; then message="Automation Test was started but Patch-set too old, rebase your change to recreate the images" elif [ "$verified" == "OK" ]; then message="Automation Test was started but images do not exist, retry the review compilation to create the images" else message="Images was not found, we will search again in 20 Min" fi echo $message ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --message "'$message'" --tag "'Automation'" $change,$lastps exit 2 fi else ps=$lastps lastps=0 fi done
rm -f current$change.txt $change.txt
echo ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review $change,$ps: Copying files ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --message "'Copying files for Automation test was started: $BUILD_URL, on pc2run: $NODE_NAME'" --tag "'Automation'" $change,$ps
net use z: /delete net use z: "\\\\10.59.0.87\\Firmwares"
REFTARGET=${change}-$ps ImagesList=("450HD" "445HD" "440HD" "430HD" "405HD")
echo Start copying files COUNTER=0 countImages=${#ImagesList[@]} while [ $countImages -gt 0 ]; do countImages=${#ImagesList[@]} for Image in $(curl -ks -u $User -X GET $ARTIFACTORY/$REFTARGET | grep -v _logs_ | grep '.sim.tgz\|.img' | cut -d'"' -f4); do PRD=$(echo $Image | sed 's:.UC::; s:_.*::'); if [[ "${ImagesList[@]}" =~ "$PRD" ]]; then #TargetImage=$(echo $Image | sed "s:\.\(img\|sim.tgz\)$:_${REFTARGET}.\1:") TargetImage=$Image #echo -- Check if $TargetImage exist in z: if [ ! -f z:$TargetImage ]; then echo ---- Download $TargetImage to z: curl -ks -u $User -X GET ${DOWNLOAD}/${REFTARGET}$Image --output z:$TargetImage else echo ---- z:$TargetImage already exist.. skip the download... fi if echo $TargetImage | grep -q img; then ((countImages--)); fi fi done if [ $countImages -ne 0 ]; then sleep 300; fi ((COUNTER++)) echo Count $COUNTER if [ $COUNTER -eq 5 ]; then countImages=0; fi done
#ImageNames=$(echo $Image | sed 's:.*_::; s:.sim.tgz::; s:.img::')_${REFTARGET}; ImageNames=$(echo $Image | sed 's:.*HD_::; s:.sim.tgz::; s:.img::') echo ImageNames=${ImageNames} >> ${WORKSPACE}/properties.txt date if [ $COUNTER -eq 5 ]; then echo files were not found ... abort exit 1 fi
ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --message "'Automation test is in queue'" --tag "'Automation'" $change,$ps
date

#!c:\cygwin\bin\bash --login
change=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4` ps=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f5`
message="images/files does not exist: $BUILD_URL" if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "3.1.0" && "$GERRIT_BRANCH" != "3.2" ]]; then message="Automation Test for branch 3.1.0 or 3.2 only, aborted Automation Test" fi
ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review \ --message "'$message'" \ --notify OWNER \ --tag "'Automation'" \ $change,$ps
